string.comment: Do an action at a later time

string.comment: Button to acknowledge a dialog

string.comment: Internet connection missing

string.comment: Error message when network connection fails

string.comment: Confirmation to delete a keyboard

resources.string: Ga ata bara kara cijimta keyboard ngǝni ya?

string.comment: Confirmation to download a keyboard update

resources.string: Ga ata bara kara hara dawunlodi ar jili keyboard ngǝni na bǝlin ni ya?

string.name: confirm_update
string.comment: Confirmation to update several resources

resources.string: Ga ata bara kara wutǝ su na bǝlin na ar keyboardyeri ka dictionariyeri ya kulini?

string.comment: Notification when resource updates are available

string.name: update_available
string.comment: Currently installed version of a resource with an available update

Suayeri na bǝlin aɗi na ar dictionary %1$s: %2$s

resources.string: Kǝtǝ fwator kod ngǝni kamnyar hara lodi ar \nkeyboard ata na\'ura laga

string.name: welcome_package
string.comment: Title to welcome.htm page (name and version)

string.name: fileprovider_undefined
string.comment: FileProvider library needed to view help file

resources.string: Mda akwa bara library na ar FileProvider kamnyar ka mdǝ wutǝ fayil ar dlara: %1$s

string.name: fatal_keyboard_error
string.comment: Fatal keyboard error (keyboard ID::packageID for language). Will load default keyboard

resources.string: Dametǝdzi na ar Fatal akwa keyboard ka %1$s:%2$s ala %3$s hulfur mnya. Akwa hara lodi ar default keyboard.

string.name: fatal_keyboard_error_short
string.comment: Error in keyboard (keyboard ID::packageID for language).

resources.string: Dametǝdzi akwa keyboard %1$s:%2$s na ar %3$s hulfur mnya.

string.name: query_associated_model
string.comment: Check if there's an available dictionary to download

resources.string: Akwa pakǝ dictionary na kǝɓa kari kamnyar katsa hara dawunlodi ni

string.name: cannot_query_associated_model
string.comment: Cannot reach server to check if there's an available dictionary to download

resources.string: Cannot connect to Keyman server to check for associated dictionary to download

string.name: confirm_download_model
string.comment: Confirmation to download a dictionary update

resources.string: Ga ata bara kara hara dawunlodi ar jili dictionary na ngǝni na bǝlin ni ya?

string.name: no_associated_model
string.comment: Confirmation there's no available dictionary to download

resources.string: Dictionary aɗiwa natǝ mda ata hara dawunlodir ni

string.name: catalog_unavailable
string.comment: Notification that the cloud resource catalog can't be updated

resources.string: Katalogu na ar kariyeri ni aɗiwa

string.name: catalog_download_start_in_background
string.comment: Notification that the resource catalog update will begin

resources.string: Jakǝngkǝr bǝlinkur kataloguni ku kurtǝ ka baɗita akwa bakgrawund

string.name: catalog_download_is_running_in_background
string.comment: Notification that the resource catalog update is still downloading

resources.string: Katalogu ni akwa hara dawunlodi harba kulini; usa, jaktǝ ngkǝrtǝ bu damzi rakka!

string.name: progress_message_checking_resource_is_running
string.comment: Progress notification that the check for a resource is still running

string.name: keyboard_download_start_in_background
string.comment: Notification that a keyboard download has started

resources.string: Dawunlodi ar keyboard ku baɗita akwa Bakgurawund

string.name: keyboard_download_is_running_in_background
string.comment: Notification that a keyboard download is still running

resources.string: Keyboard natǝ mdǝ carɓǝla ni ku kurtǝ ka baɗitǝ dawunlodi; usa, jaktǝ ngkǝrtǝ bu ɗanzi rakka!
